actions.text: On agreeing to the Peters (CA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 48).

description: Amendment sought to stipulate that the bill cannot go into effect until the Secretary confirms that the act does not adversely affect any community's water supply or water budget.
purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to stipulate that the bill cannot go into effect until the Secretary confirms that the act does not adversely affect any community's water supply or water budget.
